title: Life on earth as I know it
creator_credit: AFTRS, Lesley Furneaux-Cook and Penny McDonald
brief_description: A woman who is disillusioned with the world moves across town to move into shared accommodation with a house full of women. It is there that she meets Kate, someone who shares her despair, and on a night of torrential flooding they make some surprising discoveries about themselves. Cast includes Josephyne Oliveru, Gillian Clark and Genevieve Mooy.
